mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_PRICE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_MENU A WHERE A.ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MENU_CODE
SELECT A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_PRICE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_MENU A WHERE A.ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MENU_CODE = #{ code }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MENU A ( A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_PRICE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MENU_CODE.NEXTVAL ,#{ name } ,#{ price } ,#{ categoryCode } , 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE A.MENU_NAME N SET N.MENU_NAME = (SELECT A.MENU_NAME FROM TBL_MENU WHERE N.MENU_NAME = ' ' ) WHERE N.MENU_NAME =''
